name: Dead Twogether
description:
Description:

This little puzzle-platformer game will let you experience a post-apocalyptic world through the eyes of a little ghost and a zombie. Switch between them to solve riddles and explore what this world has to offer.

Controls:

You play alternately as a ghost and a zombie.

  • For both, it's W-A-S-D to move and F to interact.
  • You can also make the ghost scream with Q.
  • Press shift to clears throat shift between ghost and zombie.
Credits:
